Subject: Server Offline
Description:
Recently upgraded server to version 5.9.1.0. Also applied hotfix that was pushed for ADV-2024-002. Server was found to be in a crashed state after (2) weeks and is failing to load the EPP web portal. 

Console access to the server shows repeated messages of: "cifs_mount failed w/return code = -2" and "Error connecting to socket. Aborting operation".
Solution_Comment__c: Issue was solved by re-connecting the second network adapter and reconfiguring GRUB
